typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Reg as string,
		hinbnBinder as integer,
		hinbnPen as integer,
		hinbnPencil as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> srcunpivot
Aggregate1 unpivot(output(
		hi as integer,
		hinbnBinder as integer,
		hinbnPen as integer,
		hinbnPencil as integer
	),
	ungroupBy(Reg),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot1
srcunpivot aggregate(groupBy(Reg),
	hinbnBinder = sum(hinbnBinder),
		hinbnPen = sum(hinbnPen),
		hinbnPencil = sum(hinbnPencil)) ~> Aggregate1
